background: FinTech startup PaySecure needs to process credit card transactions in South America. They require a containerized architecture that maintains PCI-DSS compliance while handling sensitive payment data. The solution must scale automatically during high-traffic periods and ensure data encryption at rest and in transit.
problem: Design and implement a PCI-DSS compliant payment processing infrastructure using CDK (TypeScript) that processes financial transactions through containerized microservices. The system must handle credit card transactions securely while maintaining high availability and data encryption requirements.

environment.setup_requirements: CDK v2.x with TypeScript, AWS CLI configured for us-west-1 region

constraints: All data must be encrypted at rest and in transit using AWS KMS keys with automatic rotation; Network architecture must implement network segmentation with no direct internet access from container tasks, all egress traffic must route through NAT Gateway
